name: nut another harvest game
description:
Help a little squirrel on its quest to find a nut before winter comes

˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚

Credits:

art, story - @Fabi Reichsoellner 
code, design - @Jack Chateau-Loney

Music: Nullhertz from Pixabay

˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚

Our interpretation of the jam theme is a pick your own adventure story game about a little squirrel on its quest to find a nut because it overslept and forgot to create its harvest stash. 
The game can be played in Web or Downloaded, whichever you prefer~ We recommend you play in Full Screen

˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚

Interact with the game by clicking on the colourful text to choose the little squirrels path~
Feel free to explore the story as many times as you want, there are 5 nuts to find and 4 animals to unlock in your main menu.

˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚

This game was made for LudumDare 52 with the theme 'harvest'
submission page here: 
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/nut-another-harvest-story
